pages.text: Ships are much larger than boats. They are also faster, have storage, and can be mounted with weapons. There are two types of ships - the medium-sized Cog and the massive Brigg.

pages.title: Breaking the Ship
pages.text: Be careful if you constantly break your ship. It might drop the actual ship, but it also might just drop partial ingredients for it!
The Sail is used to craft these ships.

pages.title: Weapons
pages.text: Ships can be fitted with cannons. Right click the ship while holding a cannon to install it.$(br2)Cogs can be fitted with four cannons total, and briggs six.$(br2)You need cannonballs as ammunition. Put them in the ship's inventory. Then, you can look at where you want to fire and press the jump button.
